div.p: The most impactful theme of all time. Get this Magical Vougeion for your business to top your field by creating a website with a wide range of choices.
One-Click Installation, Responsiveness, eCommerce, Multi-language, Multi-website, RTL and many more are the pre-built benefits you are getting with Vouge.
Different Product layout options to show products in your style

span.style: width: 28px; height: 28px; line-height: 28px; text-align: center; border-radius: 50%; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgba(255, 138, 0, 0.2); color: #EF5350

div.p: Add as many hotspots you want with static or dynamic product in it

span.style: width: 28px; height: 28px; line-height: 28px; text-align: center; border-radius: 50%; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgba(255, 138, 0, 0.2); color: #EF5350

div.p: Add any icon you want and also change color of icon and background color you want

span.style: width: 28px; height: 28px; line-height: 28px; text-align: center; border-radius: 50%; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgba(255, 138, 0, 0.2); color: #EF5350

div.p: Either select dynamic option to select product or select static to customize your way

span.style: width: 28px; height: 28px; line-height: 28px; text-align: center; border-radius: 50%; font-size: 14px; background-color: rgba(255, 138, 0, 0.2); color: #EF5350

div.p: Add any product you want to display with its link

span.style: width: 28px; height: 28px; line-height: 28px; text-align: center; border-radius: 50%; font-size: 20px; background-color: rgba(255, 138, 0, 0.2); color: #EF5350

div.p: Image Hotspot is fully compatible with all devices and all screen sizes

a.class: s_figure_link btn btn-primary flat d-inline-flex align-items-center font-weight-bold

section.class: index-banner mt-4 shadow-sm position-relative overflow-hidden s_panel_video

div.p: Add your products in homepage with product banner snippet to show the hot deals and trending items

a.class: s_figure_link btn btn-primary flat d-inline-flex align-items-center font-weight-bold

div.p: Login/Signup popup makes it easy for user to login and also makes it look decent

section.p: Different Product layout options to show products in your style
Quick view gives you brief information without redirecting to product page.
A special design for mobile to show categories and give different look
User friendly and cool looking design to access your website easily
Select the variant if any, directly from the shop page with this popup, no need to redirect on product page
When you add your product to the cart it will give you option to stay on the same page or go to checkout page
When Option enabled, click the icon in header and get full info of your cart with clean design
We designed 12 different button hover effects which will look fabulous on your website
Show your products with attractive labels of 4 different types
When you add discount to the product, discount label will be added with the percentage of discount in it
Here 'Trending' is Auto-Assign Category, it will auto-assign all discounted products in this category
A separate brand filter option in shop for those who are brand enthusiastic
Price slider allows you to set minimum and maximum price range for the products
Lots of animation options to make your website modern and attractive
Add labels with 4 different types to the menus to highlight page
Using this, you can manage font size and font family of heading tags h1 to h6 from the options only.
Add services to the product to highlight them in the product page with information in popover
You can change the user information directly from the portal with user image
You can add or remove the address of the user directly from the portal from address page

div.p: 5000+ icons ready to use in your website which increases your website's look and feel.
Shop by brand slider to redirect to the shop by particular brand for those who are brand enthusiastic
Show your latest posts and news with awesome looking slider design
Shop by category slider to redirect to the shop by particular category
Product slider to represent your featured products with unique design
Create stunning multitab slider, you can add upto 5 tabs in it and personalize product by your way

div.h1: Note :- This Product is developed and tested with Odoo Addons for declared compatible versions and does not guarantee compatibility with any 3rd party module. Contact us for more information or in case of any trouble with this module.

a.p: Bizople Solutions is a team of technocrats highly experienced in ERP Implementation and Customization.We work everyday to provide the best solutions with our excellence in the various area of digitization to grow the business revenue of our clients. Our young technology people love to help the customer with the most satisfactory service in Odoo ERP and E-commerce + Theme Development.
